rows.label: qst701405_msg0001
rows.name:
Let's see... This is a technical manual
on glasswork.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0002
rows.name:
It goes into great detail about the
manufacturing process. There are all
sorts of diagrams and annotations...

rows.label: qst701405_msg0003
rows.name:
Hold on... Thales came all the way
out here to bury this? Kind of weird,
isn't it?

rows.label: qst701405_msg0004
rows.name:
Well, maybe he buried it, or maybe
he came here to dig it up. We don't
know for certain.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0005
rows.name:
Didn't Sharla-san tell us that he was
worried about there being an Grail
attack on Iira?

rows.label: qst701405_msg0006
rows.name:
This is just speculation, but
maybe he left it here to spare
his knowledge from destruction.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0007
rows.name:
If you're right, then it's a terrible irony
that he met his demise in Gula...

rows.label: qst701405_msg0009
rows.name:
Think we should put it back, then?
It's probably best not to leave it in
Iira...

rows.label: qst701405_msg0010
rows.name:
No, I think that this is something
Sharla-san needs to see.

rows.label: qst701405_msg0011
rows.name:
She should be the one to decide
what to do with it...
